description: Add workflow commands to cortex-cli.sh: workflow run, status, cancel, list, validate, visualize

features: cortex workflow run <workflow-name> --inputs <file> --dry-run - Validate without executing
cortex workflow status <run-id> - Show workflow execution status
cortex workflow status <run-id> --follow - Stream live progress
cortex workflow cancel <run-id> - Cancel running workflow
cortex workflow list - List all workflow runs (active, completed, failed)
cortex workflow list --active - List only active runs
cortex workflow list --failed - List only failed runs
cortex workflow validate <workflow-file> - Validate workflow YAML
cortex workflow visualize <workflow-name> - Show ASCII diagram
cortex workflow outputs <run-id> - Show workflow outputs
cortex workflow logs <run-id> [step-id] - Show workflow/step logs
cortex workflow resume <run-id> - Resume failed/interrupted workflow
Interactive workflow status with live updates
Estimated time remaining based on step durations

acceptance_criteria: cortex workflow run successfully executes security-audit.yaml
cortex workflow status shows live progress during execution
cortex workflow cancel successfully stops running workflow
cortex workflow list shows all runs with correct states
cortex workflow validate catches YAML errors
cortex workflow visualize displays correct DAG
Help text documents all commands and options
Tab completion support for workflow names
